SELECT u.id, u.*, ur.score, uc.fighters fighters, f.id as head, f.src as headSrc, badge.uri badgeUri, badge.note badgeNote FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN user_rank ur ON u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.quarter = 's1' LEFT JOIN upload_file f on u.head = f.id LEFT JOIN badge on u.badge = badge.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(fighter_no) AS fighters FROM user_fighter WHERE quarter = #{ro.quarter} AND total >= 5 GROUP BY user_id )uc ON u.id = uc.user_id
AND (fighters LIKE concat('%,',#{ro.fighterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},',%') OR fighters = #{ro.fighterNo} OR fighters LIKE concat('%,',#{ro.fighterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) OR fighters LIKE concat(#{ro.fighterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},',%'))
AND (u.nick_name LIKE concat('%',#{ro.text,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
ORDER BY LENGTH(u.nick_name) ASC, ur.score DESC
ORDER BY ISNULL(ur.update_time), ur.update_time DESC
